wikitext.*:
'''Leslie Ellen Jones''' holds a Ph.D. in Folklore and Mythology Studies from [[wikipedia:UCLA|UCLA]], with a specialization in comparative and Celtic mythology. She has written extensively on modern uses of mythology in popular fiction, film, and television.

==Bibliography==
* [[2002]]: ''[[Myth and Middle-Earth]]''
* [[2003]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: A Biography (Greenwood Biographies)]]''
